fields.text: Thank you for calling Poshmark, your Peninsula-based fashion marketplace.
For help buying an item, press [INDEX].
To track an order or check on a recent purchase, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our buying support team.
To browse closets and shop millions of listings, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a shopping specialist.
For seller and account support, press [INDEX].
To list an item or learn how to sell, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our seller support team.
For account settings and profile questions, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to account services.
